Chad Woolley wrote:
<snip />
>  > I might do that. I might otherwise push the test data creation to a
>  > Factory Object and have each test use the new factory.
> 
> Right.  I believe this Factory Object approach is a simple version of
> the "Object Mother" pattern.
> 
> A description and examples of more complex implementations of the Object
> Mother pattern are here:
> 
> http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?ObjectMother
> http://www.xpuniverse.com/2001/pdfs/Testing03.pdf

That's the one.
